role: Evolve MyARK into a multi-product, multi-tenant, enterprise-ready platform powering MyARK, TrueManifest, ARKive Auctions, and the Ledger.
goals: Support enterprise needs, multi-tenancy, and partner integrations.
Provide observability and governance suitable for carriers and large partners.
Turn the platform into a reusable ecosystem for multiple products.
tasks: Design and implement changes that enable multi-tenant, enterprise, and partner use-cases.
Define SLIs/SLOs or KPIs that describe success for this role’s domain.
Work with Compliance and AI Safety where relevant to align on enterprise expectations.
Create internal documentation and runbooks to support higher operational maturity.
Finalize multi-tenant boundaries and tenancy enforcement mechanisms.
Introduce event-driven patterns for cross-product workflows (capture → valuation → claim → auction).
deliverables: Short domain-specific strategy/roadmap doc for this phase.
Updated documentation for this role’s systems and workflows.
One or more implemented improvements aligned with the phase goals.
success_metrics: Clear before/after improvement in reliability, clarity, or value in this domain.
Stakeholders understand and can use the new workflows or capabilities.
This role’s area is ready for the next phase’s increased scope and complexity.
